features: Extra-large openings in the shield provide maximum airflow and allow baby's sensitive skin to "breathe"

Orthodontic nipple shape is asymmetrical with a scooped bottom: Flatter to allow for more room for natural sucking motion, slimmer to reduce pressure on jaw and teeth, and narrower to help prevent teeth misalignment
Heart-shaped shield fits perfectly under baby's nose for easy breathing
Pack of 4 NUK Space orthodontic pacifiers; size 6-18 months
BPA free; silicone nipples; top-rack dishwasher safe
body.description: Having a difficult time finding the right pacifier for your baby? The new NUK Space pacifiers have a revolutionary shield that has extra-large openings, enabling maximum airflow and allowing baby’s gentle skin to “breathe.” Like all NUK pacifiers, NUK Space is accepted by 95% of babies* and feature the improved orthodontic nipple shape. NUK’s asymmetrical nipple naturally fits baby’s palate and is now improved to allow for more room for a natural sucking motion, reduce pressure on teeth and jaw, and helps prevent teeth misalignment. Invented over 60 years ago by pediatric dentists and doctors, the NUK pacifier is modeled after the natural shape of mom’s nipple while breastfeeding. This makes for an easy transition from breast to pacifier and back. The NUK heart-shaped shield on NUK Space fits perfectly under baby’s nose for easier breathing and prevents irritation. (*Based on Market Research, 2017, tested with 307 pacifier users)

NUK Space Pacifiers have a revolutionary shield that has extra-large openings, enabling maximum airflow and allowing baby’s gentle skin to “breathe." The heart-shaped shield fits perfectly under baby’s nose for easier breathing and prevents irritation. Like all NUK pacifiers, NUK Space feature a unique, improved asymmetrical nipple that naturally fits baby’s palate to allow more room for a natural sucking motion, reduces pressure on teeth and jaws, and helps prevent teeth misalignment. Invented over 60 years ago by pediatric dentists and doctors, NUK orthodontic pacifiers are modeled after the natural shape of mom’s nipple while breastfeeding, creating an easy transition from breast to pacifier and back. All pacifiers are BPA free and dishwasher safe (top rack only).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I swear by NUK pacifiers. Slimmer design. No issues as with other brands.Update 1/15/2021: I really prefer this NUK design with the holes because there’s more airflow vs with the other NUK it would press against my son’s mouth area and once there is drool it just stays there pressed against the skin. This one is so much better! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loves them!
reviews.reviewText: What I like most about these is they dont leave Mark's on her face after she's had it in for a long period of time. They ate easy to clean & affordable. I've also noticed the shape of this binki helps her hold it in her mouth with such ease. I'm not having to put it back in 100 times a day. 💯 the only binki we have used for months & will continue using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love that these don’t leave indentions around my sons mouth
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried most of all nuk brand pacifiers in stores and most all seem to leave a red suction indention on my sons face. But these don’t! I also love how these have openings and their super cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall good but one cleaning note
reviews.reviewText: These work great for our breastfed baby.Only one note that other online reviews also note- the Nuk pacifiers often take water into the nipple. For this reason, we don’t clean with soap and have to rinse and then boil them to clean/sterilize.The soap would come back out of the nipple (on the back size, not the nipple side) but could get into baby’s mouth. Unfortunately (or maybe fortunately?) for us, she likes these better than other pacifiers so we deal with the special cleaning needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very good pacifier, and My daughters Favorite
reviews.reviewText: These are very well made and My Daughter loves them. They also tend to keep her face and area around her mouth Dryer than some others she has. The open ring like part around them helps with this and she likes to hold them with this part. She is getting her teeth and has yet to demolish one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: My grandson got a horrible rash around his mouth because he’s teething and drooling, from the regular pacifier I’ve always used that’s was closed and not much air flow around the mouth, but I done a lil research and found this and they have been a life saver!!! In just a few days his rash cleared up and everyone is happier lol
Excelente calidad y muyy bonitos, me gusta la marca y a un súper precio
Items quality is good but came with plastic bag

reviews.reviewTitle: This is what i received.. speechless
